metadata.title: CVE-2019-7346 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A CSRF check issue exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3 as whenever a CSRFcheck fails, a callback function is called displaying a "Try again" button,which allows resending the failed request, making the CSRF attacksuccessful.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
